document.title: Viewing information about a feature
document.paragraph:
Once you
10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml centered the editor on a feature, you have access to its text. The feature tab in the context tool can display more information. To have access to it, you have first to center the context tool on the wanted class and select the feature tab. You can then consult the different views of the text of the feature (
../../../reference/80_formatters/20_feature_formatters/05_basic_text_format.xml basic text or
../../../reference/80_formatters/20_feature_formatters/10_flat_format.xml flat ) and other information such as its
../../../reference/80_formatters/20_feature_formatters/15_callers_format.xml callers or its
../../../reference/80_formatters/20_feature_formatters/30_descendant_format.xml descendant versions. The
../../../reference/60_metric_tool/00_introduction.xml metric tool provides another kind of data. It enables you to compute some
../../70_analyzing_a_project/00_introduction.xml measures on your feature.
